HotelStayEnrgyUse.name: HotelStayEnrgyUse
HotelStayEnrgyUse.description: Represents the energy consumption related to hotel stay.

CarbonFootprintReportDate.description: The date when the carbon footprint data of the associated stationary asset is due to be sent to a reporting body.

CostCenter.description: The cost center associated with this energy use record.

EmissionFctrKgCo2eRoomPerNight.description: The emissions that are calculated based on the impact of staying in a hotel. This value is measured in kg of CO2 equivalents per night.

EndDate.description: The date until when the values of this energy use record are valid.

HotelCity.description: The city in which the hotel is located

HotelCountry.description: The country in which the hotel is located.

HotelStayEmssnFctrId.description: The hotel stay mission factors that are used to calculate the emissions.

IsRecordLocked.description: Indicates whether the hotel stay energy use record is locked for editing because the associated carbon footprint is locked for editing.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name for this energy use record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

RoomCount.description: The number of rooms in the hotel. This value is used to calculate the emissions.

Scope3CrbnFtprntId.description: The scope 3 carbon footprint record that's associated with this energy use record.

Scope3EmissionsInTco2e.description: The total scope 3 emissions in metric tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent.

Scope3EmssnSrcId.description: The scope 3 emission source that's associated with this energy use record.

StartDate.description: The date from when the values of this energy use record are valid.

StayNightsCount.description: The number of nights of hotel stay. This value is used to calculate the emissions.

SuplScope3Emissions.description: The supplemental scope 3 emissions value thatâ€™s added to the calculated total scope 3 emissions value.
